acubemap 0.0.1
  • Reference

acubemap

Cubemap component for aframer.

Installation

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("JohnCoene/apath")

Example

The yokohama folder can be found at system.file("yokohama", package = "acubemap").

library(aframer)
library(acubemap)

embed_aframe(
  a_scene(
    a_dependency(),
    acubemap_dependency(),
    a_entity(
      cubemap = opts_aframe(
        folder = "yokohama"
      )
    )
  )
)
